title: The GOP Just Gave Away the Senate, but We CAN’T Quit | 1/6/21
description:
As Democrat control of the Senate looks imminent, Glenn looks back on what went wrong in Georgia. Are the stimulus checks to blame? Glenn takes on Raphael Warnock after his projected win: Critical race theory is now our national religion. With the Democrats in power, here are the radicals who would run the congressional committees. Tonight’s certification of the Electoral College results may last well into the night. Brace for leftist changes at breakneck speed over the next two years. Glenn has a message for freedom-loving Americans: Giving up is not the answer, and neither is violence. Listeners call in with their reactions to the Georgia runoff results. Stacey Abrams is apparently a god now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
